text: William Alfred Hawkins (May 20, 1940 - July 4, 2016) was a Canadian songwriter, poet, musician and journalist.Profile of William Hawkins; www.wmhawkins.com. He was known for his works in the 1960s to Canadian folk rock music and to Canadian poetry. His best known song is "Gnostic Serenade", originally recorded by 3's a Crowd. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== ==Other websites== *William Hawkins Website *Hawkins reading from his Collected Poems in Ottawa on November 28, 2015. title: William Hawkins (writer)
